title: Disconnection of modem when playing league of legends
body:
Hey, Can have your help on this

league of legends keeps on disconnecting me from the internet ie my modem suddenly goes down for some reason.
I think the reason is very related to league.
cause this happens only when I play league, the game runs for abt 25mins then my modem goes poof.
happened to me 2 times and I got suspicious and tried for another one and it went poof.

This used to happen in the old client because of pando media booster.
But now idk wats the case.
Pls Help soon suffering for 2 days. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Let's double check some of your network settings to see if something was reset or isn't configured in the best way. You can use this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help you adjust some of those settings like port forwarding and DNS.
It's not a user, or connection problem.

If you're having troubles too, you're welcome to go through those basic steps to see if they help. We need to go through the simplest fixes first when troubleshooting otherwise you could spend hours trying things when one of those basic steps would have worked. Feel free to give those steps a go, otherwise, we may not be able to help much more.
